gcpConfig.title: GCP Credentials Configuration
gcpConfig.description: GCP credentials configuration for authenticating with Pub/Sub.

projectId.title: GCP Project ID
projectId.description: GCP Project ID where Pub/Sub topics are located. If not specified, will be read from credentials.

hostPort.title: Host and Port
hostPort.description: Pub/Sub APIs URL. For local testing with the emulator, use http://localhost:8085.

useEmulator.title: Use Emulator
useEmulator.description: Connect to a Pub/Sub emulator rather than the production service.

schemaRegistryEnabled.title: Enable Schema Registry
schemaRegistryEnabled.description: Enable fetching schemas from Pub/Sub Schema Registry.

includeSubscriptions.title: Include Subscriptions
includeSubscriptions.description: Include subscription metadata for each topic.

includeDeadLetterTopics.title: Include Dead Letter Topics
includeDeadLetterTopics.description: Include dead letter topics in metadata extraction.

topicFilterPattern.description: Regex to only fetch topics that matches the pattern.
topicFilterPattern.title: Topic Filter Pattern
